title: Township to Square Miles Converter – Convert Townships, Acres and km²

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Township area Township area = 6 miles × 6 miles = 36 square miles

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Formulas acres = square miles × 640 square kilometres = square miles × 2.589988 Combining these: acres = townships × 36 × 640 = townships × 23,040 square kilometres ≈ townships × 36 × 2.589988
